description:
A beginner shoe with pro performance. The Tanta rock shoes use Tenaya’s M4 technology, keeping you comfortable while making it easier to place your feet right where you want them. Extra rubber on the toes gives you longer lasting shoes, while helping hold edges better. A full sole adds stability and support on longer climbs, while still letting you feel what you’re climbing.

  • Microfibre upper ensures a consistent fit over time
  • Stretchy and breathable bellows tongue wraps your feet while keeping you dry
  • Reinforced toe-box offers greater durability so you can climb for longer
  • Velcro® strap and heel tab allows for an easy on/off with solid support
  • 4 micro-layer insole provides direct input, because small movements make a big difference
  • Adaptable last works with wide and narrow feet
name: Tenaya Tanta Rock Shoes - Unisex
